name: Game of Goats
storyline: In Game of Goats you fight your friends or random enemies in over 20 different minigames. Who is faster? Who got the better reaction? Who will have the upper hand? Test our prototype, help us creating the game and, most important, show off your skills! We hope to see you soon!
summary:
20+ Minigames for Competetive Plays! 
 
Are you ready to accept the challenge? 
In Game of Goats you fight your friends or random enemies in over 20 different minigames. Who is faster? Who got the better reaction? Who will have the upper hand? Test our prototype, help us creating the game and, most important, show off your skills! We hope to see you soon!
